instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3588: What is 820-3588? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3588</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A not turn on
threads.message:
this imac not turn on, only 1 led  light before press power and after also
I already tried with another power supply in good condition, problem persists
the power button is in good condition
when pressing power  the 1 led blinks once

This logic board I don't know what measures to take, thank you

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3588</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A not turn on
threads.message:
Check for drop pulse at <SIGNAL>12V_S5_FET</SIGNAL>.
You may need to change <TRANSISTOR>Q6970</TRANSISTOR>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3588</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A not turn on
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3588</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A not turn on
threads.message:
You've said to note LED0301 pulsing, when press power button.
Do you note drop pulse at <SIGNAL>12V_S5_FET</SIGNAL> at same moment???

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3588</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A not turn on
threads.message:
<SIGNAL>12V_S5_FET</SIGNAL>;it goes down to 11.3v and goes back to 12. 11 when I press power
The led turns off for an instant when value from <SIGNAL>12V_S5_FET12</SIGNAL>.11  to 11 and it is at the same moment
